DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History Performed Observation Outcome Occurrence Date and Time Range ISO21090.IVL.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date and time span in which the medical history event began and ended.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History Performed Observation Outcome Occurrence Date and Time Range
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Watching something and taking note of what happens.
